metrics.name: IntegrationLatency
metrics.documentation: The time between when API Gateway relays a request to the backend and when it receives a response from the backend

metrics.name: Latency
metrics.documentation: The time between when API Gateway receives a request from a client and when it returns a response to the client

metrics.name: CacheHitCount
metrics.documentation: The number of requests served from the API cache

metrics.name: CacheMissCount
metrics.documentation: The number of requests served from the backend

metrics.name: 5XXError
metrics.documentation: The number of server-side errors captured

metrics.name: 4XXError
metrics.documentation: The number of client-side errors captured
